content: In the mechanized capital of Stenograd, where the Behavioral Compliance Index quietly rules every life, chaos erupts after the sudden death of Marek Halden—the architect of the entire system. As factions within the shadowy Council clash, Oksana Lintz, burdened by fear and duty, triggers Halden’s failsafe: Mosaic Reversion, resetting everyone’s BCI scores to their chaotic 2022 levels. Overnight, the city’s hierarchy flips—old privileges vanish, exiles return to power, and a wave of uncertainty sweeps through workplaces and homes. Desperate for stability, citizens gather beneath the city’s mural, hoping to renegotiate their destinies, while Oksana secretly tracks the fallout. But the reset brings haunting echoes; old secrets and shames, once buried in BCI archives, resurface, fracturing trust and fueling calls for the deletion of personal data. Amid public outcry and swelling protests, the Council is dragged into the open, forced to confront the trauma their silent algorithm unleashed, as Stenograd’s people demand not just reform but the right to own their past—and their future.
